issue.title: [C++] Add cast "metafunction" to FunctionRegistry that addresses dispatching to appropriate type-specific CastFunction
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8918](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8918). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
By setting the output type in `CastOptions`, we can write

```Java

call_function("cast", [arg], cast_options)
```

This simplifies use of casting for binding developers. This mimics the standard SQL

```Java

CAST(expr AS target_type)
```
